snippet.title: Indygo Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Vote for us on Steam! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=911799815
Indygo is a narrative game with elements of point'n'click set in one room only - painting workshop. It tells the story of a painter who suffers from depression. Solve puzzles and make decisions that affect how the game ends. Find us on
pigmentumstudio.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IndygoGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IndygoGame
